show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content:
Today we speak to Dr Elaine Leeder author of My Life with Lifers: Lessons for a Teacher, Humanity has no Bars. <!--more--> Also Joining us in studio is Harrison Misioka Seuga former 21 year state prisoner released in 2010 and now finishing a college degree at SF State University.
Then we interview Linda Evans with All of Us or None and Organizer at Legal Services for Prisoners with Children.
She is a former political prisoner whose sentence was commuted by President Clinton on January 20, 2001.
